examples: The neighbour's teenage give me grief every time they see me.

definitions.definition: Emotional pain , generally arising from misfortune, significant personal loss , bereavement , misconduct of oneself or others, etc.; sorrow ; sadness .
examples: She was worn out from so much grief .

definitions.definition: A cause or instance of sorrow or pain ; that which afflicts or distresses ; a trial .

secondary_definitions: Emotional pain , generally arising from misfortune, significant personal loss , bereavement , misconduct of oneself or others, etc.; sorrow ; sadness . [from early 14th c.]
( countable ) A cause or instance of sorrow or pain ; that which afflicts or distresses ; a trial .
